languages.text: "Действуем, как сказал Соломон: надавим на старшие чины колонии — они явно замешаны в происходящем".

traits.locale_text: "Действуем, как сказал Соломон: надавим на старшие чины колонии — они явно замешаны в происходящем".

languages.text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."
languages.original_text: "Действуем, как сказал Соломон: надавим на старшие чины колонии — они явно замешаны в происходящем".

traits.locale_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."
"We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."
"We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."
"We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."
"We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

languages.text: "Solomorne'un dediği gibi yapıp koloninin üst kademelerindekilere baskı uygulayacağız. Açıkça olup bitene karışmış durumdalar."
languages.original_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne'un dediği gibi yapıp koloninin üst kademelerindekilere baskı uygulayacağız. Açıkça olup bitene karışmış durumdalar."

languages.text: « Nous allons suivre la recommandation de Solomorne en faisant pression sur les officiers supérieurs de la colonie, qui sont clairement mêlés à cette histoire. »
languages.original_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons suivre la recommandation de Solomorne en faisant pression sur les officiers supérieurs de la colonie, qui sont clairement mêlés à cette histoire. »

languages.text: 「ソロモーンの言う通りに行動しよう。コロニーの上層部に圧力をかける。今回の件には明らかに彼らが関与している」
languages.original_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンの言う通りに行動しよう。コロニーの上層部に圧力をかける。今回の件には明らかに彼らが関与している」

languages.text: “就按索罗蒙说的办，向这座殖民地的高层施压。发生了这样的情况，他们肯定脱不开干系。”
languages.original_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

traits.locale_text: “就按索罗蒙说的办，向这座殖民地的高层施压。发生了这样的情况，他们肯定脱不开干系。”

languages.text: «Haremos lo que Solomorne sugiere: presionar a los rangos más elevados de la colonia. Claramente están involucrados en la situación».
languages.original_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

traits.locale_text: «Haremos lo que Solomorne sugiere: presionar a los rangos más elevados de la colonia. Claramente están involucrados en la situación».

languages.text: "Wir machen es, wie Solomorne sagt: Wir üben Druck auf die Führungskräfte der Kolonie aus ... sie sind in die Geschehnisse eindeutig verstrickt."
languages.original_text: "We do as Solomorne said: we apply pressure to the senior ranks of the colony — they are clearly involved in what's going on."

traits.locale_text: "Wir machen es, wie Solomorne sagt: Wir üben Druck auf die Führungskräfte der Kolonie aus ... sie sind in die Geschehnisse eindeutig verstrickt."
